[event]
# to Lost
type=on_trigger
location=4,18,2,1
intermap=lost.txt,10,39

[event]
# forgotten ring
type=on_trigger
location=11,25,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=130,12,25,fixed,1
mapmod=object,11,25,176
repeat=false
requires_not_status=e_forgottenring
set_status=e_forgottenring
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Treasure Chest

[event]
type=on_load
location=11,21,1,1
mapmod=object,11,25,176
requires_status=e_forgottenring

[enemygroup]
# random antlions
type=antlion
location=18,15,5,9
level=1,3
number=0,2

[enemygroup]
# random antlions
type=antlion
location=33,15,5,9
level=1,3
number=0,2
